descriptionlist.description: Lotus Dark has stopped receiving updates and I created many extra icons for it. I decided to make the icons publicaly available through this package. While you can totally install this without buying Lotus Dark it really won't work all that well so I recommend you also buy Lotus Dark from the Packix repository.

This theme adds icons for a lot of icons!

  • 1.1.1.1: Faster Internet
  • AdminVUE
  • Agar.io
  • AirMail
  • Arena of Valor
  • AutoTouch
  • BanG Dream! Girls Band Party!
  • BlackBoard
  • Brawl Stars
  • Browser and Documents Manager
  • BytaFont 3
  • Class Timetable
  • Counter - Tally Counter
  • Datum Prikker
  • Dragon City Mobile
  • Entrust IdentifyGuard Mobile
  • F.lux
  • Fandom
  • Habitica: Gamified Taskmanager
  • HealthFace
  • Hoppenhelm
  • Hornbach
  • Ikea Store
  • Jumbo (Dutch supermarket)
  • Knaek App
  • Magikarp Jump
  • McDonalds (the new app)

  • MedGemak
  • Microsoft Remote Dekstop
  • Mijn DSW
  • Mini Golf King
  • MyThuas
  • NFCWriterX (from Limneos)
  • NXBoot (from mologie)
  • NatWest International
  • NatWest Mobile Banking
  • New York Pizza
  • NordVPN: VPN Fast & Unlimited
  • ParentVUE

  • Pythonista 3

  • Rollectra

  • Show My Homework

No screenshots for this item. No options to configure. Toggle the theme in Anemone / Snowboard
